Name: Unit Weighted
Def: All input and output arcs weight 1.
Ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

Name: State Machine
Def: Each transition has exactly one input arc and one output arc.
Ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

Name: Marked Graph
Def: Each place has exactly one input arc and one output arc.
Ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

Name: Join Free
Def: Each transition has exactly one input arc.
Ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

Name: Choice Free
Def: No shared place, each place has at most one output arc.
Ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

Name: Fork Attribution
Def: A Join Free and Choice Free net.
Ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

Name: Equal Conflict
Def: Homogeneous Free Choice Net.
Ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

Name: Free Choice
Def: If two transitions have at least one shared input places, they have no other input places.
Ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

Name: Restricted Free Choice
Def: A Free-Choice net in which every place  holds post(p)>1 => pre(post(p))=p
Ref: Joachim Wehler, Free-Choice Petri Nets without frozen tokens and Bipolar Synchronization Systems, https://arxiv.org/abs/cs/0609095

Name: Asymmetric Choice
Def: if two places have common input transitions then the set of input transitions of the one is a subset of the set of input transitions of the other.
Ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

Name: Safe
Def: The amount of tokens in each place is bounded by 1.
Ref: T. Murata, Petri nets: Properties, analysis and applications, in Proceedings of the IEEE, vol. 77, no. 4, pp. 541-580, April 1989, doi: 10.1109/5.24143.

Name: Bounded
Def: The amount of tokens in each place is bounded.
Ref: T. Murata, Petri nets: Properties, analysis and applications, in Proceedings of the IEEE, vol. 77, no. 4, pp. 541-580, April 1989, doi: 10.1109/5.24143.

Name: K-Bounded
Def: The amount of tokens in each place is bounded by K.
Ref: T. Murata, Petri nets: Properties, analysis and applications, in Proceedings of the IEEE, vol. 77, no. 4, pp. 541-580, April 1989, doi: 10.1109/5.24143.

Name: K-Marking
Def: The initial marking of each place is a multiple of k.
Ref: Llorens, Marisa & Oliver, Javier & Silva, Josep & Tamarit, Salvador. (2017). An Integrated Environment for Petri Net Slicing. 112-124. 10.1007/978-3-319-57861-3_8.  https://www.researchgate.net/publication/316702639_An_Integrated_Environment_for_Petri_Net_Slicing

Name: Pure
Def: The net has no self loop.
Ref: T. Murata, Petri nets: Properties, analysis and applications, in Proceedings of the IEEE, vol. 77, no. 4, pp. 541-580, April 1989, doi: 10.1109/5.24143.

Name: Nonpure Only Simple Side Conditions
Def: The net can contain self loop only with weights of 1.
Ref: Reference missing.

Name: Reversible
Def: There is a home marking reachable from all markings reached from the intinial marking.
Ref: T. Murata, Petri nets: Properties, analysis and applications, in Proceedings of the IEEE, vol. 77, no. 4, pp. 541-580, April 1989, doi: 10.1109/5.24143.

Name: Homogeneous
Def: For each place p, all output weights of p are equal.
Ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

Name: Strongly Connected
Def: There is a path from each place to every other place.
Ref: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Connectivity_(graph_theory)

Name: Weakly Connected
Def: There is a path from each place to every other place considering the graph non oriented.
Ref: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Connectivity_(graph_theory)

Name: Isolated Elements
Def: There is an element with no input or output.

Name: Well Connected
Def: Every place and transition has at least one input.
Ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

Name: Well Formed
Def: Structuraly live and structurally bounded.
Ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

Name: Structurally Live
Def: A marking M exists such that the net is live.
Ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

Name: Structurally Bounded
Def: The system is bounded for each initial marking.
Ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

Name: Strongly Live
Def: For every reachable marking, for each transition, there exists a firing sequence after which the transition is enable.
Ref: Llorens, Marisa & Oliver, Javier & Silva, Josep & Tamarit, Salvador. (2017). An Integrated Environment for Petri Net Slicing. 112-124. 10.1007/978-3-319-57861-3_8.  https://www.researchgate.net/publication/316702639_An_Integrated_Environment_for_Petri_Net_Slicing

Name: Weakly Live
Def: There is no reachable dead marking.
Ref: Llorens, Marisa & Oliver, Javier & Silva, Josep & Tamarit, Salvador. (2017). An Integrated Environment for Petri Net Slicing. 112-124. 10.1007/978-3-319-57861-3_8.  https://www.researchgate.net/publication/316702639_An_Integrated_Environment_for_Petri_Net_Slicing

Name: Simply Lve
Def: Each transition can be fired at least once.
Ref: Llorens, Marisa & Oliver, Javier & Silva, Josep & Tamarit, Salvador. (2017). An Integrated Environment for Petri Net Slicing. 112-124. 10.1007/978-3-319-57861-3_8.  https://www.researchgate.net/publication/316702639_An_Integrated_Environment_for_Petri_Net_Slicing

Name: Persistent
Def: From each reachable marking, no transition firing can disable any other transition.
Ref: T. Murata, Petri nets: Properties, analysis and applications, in Proceedings of the IEEE, vol. 77, no. 4, pp. 541-580, April 1989, doi: 10.1109/5.24143.

Name: Backward Persistent
Ref: Raymond Devillers, Thomas Hujsa. Analysis and Synthesis of Weighted Marked Graph Petri Nets:Exact and Approximate Methods. Fundamenta Informaticae, Polskie Towarzystwo Matematyczne,2019, 169 (1-2), pp.1 - 30.  10.3233/FI-2019-1837. hal-02332309

Name: Forward Conflict Free
Def: Each place has at most one output arc.
Ref: T. Murata, Petri nets: Properties, analysis and applications, in Proceedings of the IEEE, vol. 77, no. 4, pp. 541-580, April 1989, doi: 10.1109/5.24143.

Name: Backward Conflict Free
Def: Each place has at most one input arc.
Ref: T. Murata, Petri nets: Properties, analysis and applications, in Proceedings of the IEEE, vol. 77, no. 4, pp. 541-580, April 1989, doi: 10.1109/5.24143.

Name: Binary Conflict Free
Def: In every reachable marking,  for any enabled pair of transitions, there are enough tokens for both transitions.
Ref: Llorens, Marisa & Oliver, Javier & Silva, Josep & Tamarit, Salvador. (2017). An Integrated Environment for Petri Net Slicing. 112-124. 10.1007/978-3-319-57861-3_8.  https://www.researchgate.net/publication/316702639_An_Integrated_Environment_for_Petri_Net_Slicing

Name: Non decreasing
Def: The token content of any directed circuit in the net is never decreased by transition firing.
Ref: T. Murata, Petri nets: Properties, analysis and applications, in Proceedings of the IEEE, vol. 77, no. 4, pp. 541-580, April 1989, doi: 10.1109/5.24143.

Name: Increasing
Def: The token content of any directed circuit in the net is never increased transition firing.
Ref: T. Murata, Petri nets: Properties, analysis and applications, in Proceedings of the IEEE, vol. 77, no. 4, pp. 541-580, April 1989, doi: 10.1109/5.24143.

Name: Circuit
Def: Each node has exactly one input and one output.
Ref: Reference missing.

Name: Siphon Circuit
Def: The set of places in every directed circuit is a syphon.
Ref: T. Murata, Petri nets: Properties, analysis and applications, in Proceedings of the IEEE, vol. 77, no. 4, pp. 541-580, April 1989, doi: 10.1109/5.24143.

Name: Trap Circuit
Def: The set of places in every directed circuit is a trap.
Ref: T. Murata, Petri nets: Properties, analysis and applications, in Proceedings of the IEEE, vol. 77, no. 4, pp. 541-580, April 1989, doi: 10.1109/5.24143.

Name: Siphon Circuit Contained
Def: The set of places in every directed circuit contains a syphon.
Ref: T. Murata, Petri nets: Properties, analysis and applications, in Proceedings of the IEEE, vol. 77, no. 4, pp. 541-580, April 1989, doi: 10.1109/5.24143.

Name: Trap Circuit Contained
Def: The set of places in every directed circuit contains a trap.
Ref: T. Murata, Petri nets: Properties, analysis and applications, in Proceedings of the IEEE, vol. 77, no. 4, pp. 541-580, April 1989, doi: 10.1109/5.24143.

Name: Consistent
Ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

Name: Conservative
Ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

Name: Homogeneous with K shared place
Def: Homogeneous net with at most k shared places.
Ref: Hujsa, Thomas & Berthomieu, Bernard & Dal Zilio, Silvano & Botlan, Didier. (2020). On the Petri Nets with a Single Shared Place and Beyond. https://arxiv.org/abs/2005.04818

Name: Homogeneous with 1 shared place
Def: Homogeneous net with at most 1 shared place.
Ref: Hujsa, Thomas & Berthomieu, Bernard & Dal Zilio, Silvano & Botlan, Didier. (2020). On the Petri Nets with a Single Shared Place and Beyond. https://arxiv.org/abs/2005.04818

Name: transition
Def: output
